justification: Proposal is A-centric and mislabels Xavier Carter (A’s Tier 1 RB) as depth. Minimal evidence the model understood B’s contrarian mindset or preferences (deep-threat WRs, dual-threat QBs). While B does have surplus TEs and could use an RB upgrade, this is not articulated. Trade undermines A’s urgent win-now needs by downgrading RB to upgrade TE. Explanation is generic, lacks roster- and role-specific justification.
